Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /register
2. Enter valid email: newuser@example.com
3. Enter password: password123
4. Enter confirm password: password123
5. Enter CCCD: 123456789012
6. Enter phone: 0987654321
7. Click Register
Test Data:
Email: newuser@example.com
Password: password123
Confirm: password123
CCCD: 123456789012
Phone: 0987654321
Expected Result:
✅ No validation errors
✅ Loading state shown
✅ Redirect to /verify-email?email=newuser@example.com
✅ Success message

Test Steps:
1. Login first
2. Navigate to /register
Expected Result:
✅ Redirect to / (home page)
✅ Cannot access register page

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to /register
Expected Result:
✅ Register page displayed
✅ Form is accessible

Test Steps:
1. On verify email page
2. Check console for OTP (mock mode)
3. Enter correct OTP
4. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
✅ Success: Email verified successfully!
✅ Redirect to /login after 2 seconds
✅ User is_verified = TRUE

Test Steps:
1. Enter wrong OTP: 999999
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
❌ Error: Invalid or expired OTP code
❌ User remains unverified

Test Steps:
1. Enter OTP: 12345 (5 digits)
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
❌ Error: OTP must be 6 digits
❌ No API call made

Test Steps:
1. Leave OTP field empty
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result: ❌ Error: OTP code is required

Test Steps:
1. Wait for OTP to expire (timer shows 0:00)
2. Try to verify
Expected Result:
❌ Verify button disabled
❌ Message: OTP has expired. Please request a new one.

Test Steps: 1. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result:
✅ Success: OTP has been resent to your email
✅ New OTP in console
✅ Cooldown timer starts (60s)
✅ Expiration timer resets to 5:00
✅ Old OTP invalidated

Test Steps: 1. Click Resend OTP again immediately
Expected Result:
❌ Button disabled
❌ Shows countdown: Resend (59s), Resend (58s), etc.

Test Steps:
1. Wait for cooldown to finish
2. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result:
✅ New OTP sent
✅ Cooldown restarts

Test Steps:
1. Clear email field
2. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result: ❌ Error: Email is required

Test Steps:
1. Fill form correctly
2. Click Register
3. Observe UI during API call
Expected Result:
✅ Button shows loading state
✅ All inputs disabled
✅ Cannot submit again

Precondition: Redirected from register with email param
Test Steps:
1. Register with test@example.com
2. Check verify email page
Expected Result:
✅ Email field pre-filled
✅ Email field disabled

Test Steps:
1. Observe timer on verify email page
2. Watch countdown
Expected Result:
✅ Timer shows 5:00 initially
✅ Counts down: 4:59, 4:58, ...
✅ Format: MM:SS

Test Steps:
1. Click Resend OTP
2. Observe button text
Expected Result:
✅ Button text: Resend (60s)
✅ Counts down to Resend (1s)
✅ Then becomes Resend OTP

Test Steps:
1. Enter invalid data
2. Click Register
3. Correct the error
Expected Result:
✅ Error message displayed in red box
✅ Error clears when corrected

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /register
2. Fill valid data
3. Click Register
4. Redirected to verify email
5. Enter correct OTP
6. Click Verify Email
7. Redirected to login
Expected Result:
✅ Complete flow works end-to-end
✅ User can login after verification

Test Steps:
1. Register new user
2. Verify email with OTP
3. Go to login page
4. Login with registered credentials
Expected Result:
✅ Login successful
✅ Token saved
✅ Redirect to home

2. Skip verification (go to login)
3. Try to login
Expected Result:

❌ Error: Please verify your email before logging in
